title: Asian noodle soup

default: 300ml/10fl oz hot chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetable stock)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Bring the chicken or vegetable stock to a simmer in a saucepan. Add the noodles, carrot, spring onions and garlic and simmer for 5 minutes.
Gently pour the beaten egg into the stock, stir and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
To serve, pour into a bowl and sprinkle with coriander.
